name: One Way Curriculum
description: ONE WAY is a four week teaching series that will help your students to hear the truth of God's plan for their life over the noisy cultural truth assault that targetst them daily.  We must equip our students to know who Jesus is and why He is the way that they should commit their lives to.  This series will give you an interactive conversational teaching that will solidify your students faith for all eternity and lead them in the WAY He has for them.

name: Endurance Curriculum
description: ENDURANCE  is a four week teaching series that will encourage your students to train for the race of their life.  This series uses video, real life exercises, and in depth teaching to build muscle, heart, diet, and mental strength for students that have become apathetic in their daily faith.  Your group will come out of this teaching focused, lean, and in spiritual shape - ready to change their world.

name: Friend or Faux Curriculum
description: FRIEND OR FAUX is an in depth teaching series that will help your students discover the Biblical pattern of friendship that will change their destiny.  Every student longs for friendship and acceptance. This series will help you point them to God's plan for friendship through video, life application, and in depth teaching.  Your students will learn to lose the Faux Friends and embrace the three kinds of friends that God's Word lays out for each of us.

name: Top Secret Journal
description:

Habakkuk 1:5 - Look at the nations and watch and be utterly amazed. For I am going to do something in your days that you would not believe, even if you were told. "

name: ReCreate (Paperback)
description: IT'S TIME TO GO AFTER OUR KIDS MORE PASSIONATELY THAN THE WORLD IS CHASING THEM! There's an all-out war raging to claim the hearts and minds of this young generation - to claim the heart and mind of your child. The battleground is pop culture; the enemy's strategy is to get our children to embrace values that will ultimately destroy them. It happens every day in the sexualized brand of marketing for everything from clothing to song lyrics, from mass media to video games and websites. Perhaps your child's heart is well guarded; but even if he or she has already strayed too far into enemy turf, Ron Luce can help you take back lost ground. ReCreate lays out proven strategies to stay alert for sniper fire. Routing the enemy's influence begins with you, and it begins today. Parents, what could be more important? Ron Luce's book ReCreate, in tandom with the ReCreate small-group study DVD and corresponding study guide, will help you create a dynamic six-week study for small-group discussion. You will be encouraged and equipped as you meet weekly with other parents to strategize how to protect your family in the midst of a raging cultural war.

name: Friends Without Benefits
description: Keep Your Friends Close . . . (But Not THAT Close) One of the most common beliefs today is that sex between "friends" is harmless. It makes perfect sense! After all, nobody wants to settle down and get married at 16, but once that sex drive kicks in you've got to do something with all those hormones, right? Why not just relieve the tension without getting emotionally entangled? That's what "friends with benefits" are for . . . all the fun without the commitment. Having and being a friend with benefits may sound like a risk-free option, but the truth is that sleeping around, even with good friends, is hazardous to your physical, mental, emotional and spiritual health. There are always consequences when we distort something that God has created; and because He's the one who dreamed up sex in the first place, it's a good idea to know what He intended when He invented it for us. Ron Luce speaks to youth all over the world, and he has listened to your questions, fears and hopes. In Friends Without Benefits, he takes on the desire (and pressure) to have a great sex life. He looks at the possibilities from various angles and lets teens openly share their views, mistakes and discoveries - all in a way that will help you see how God's plan for a great sex life is a great plan for you as well. Discover the real benefit of making the right choices when it comes to sex - and when it comes to friends.

name: BattleCry for a Generation
description:
Battle Cry For A Generation -- The Fight To Save America's Youth 

An evil enemy has launched a brutal attack.  Millions of souls are at risk. 
 
There is but one hope, and if we fail . . . the youth of our nation could be lost forever!


Author:  Ron Luce
Foreword by Chuck Colson

name: BattleCry Curriculum
description:
Never before has a generation experienced such intense spiritual warfare. Teens are under a cultural onslaught, and too many of our young people are being lost to the temptations of the enemy! Now is the time to save a generation. As adults who care about today's young people, it is up to us to see and understand the reality of what teens face in this immoral, sex-saturated culture. We must unite and begin to actively engage the forces that are winning the hearts and minds of young people.

This 6-week small group study to accompany Ron Luce's book, Battle Cry for a Generation, will equip you to fight to save America's youth.

    This kit includes 2 DVDs and 10 discussion guides packed with resources such as:

  • Video teaching from BattleCry's founder Ron Luce
  • Student interviews about their struggles
  • Statistics with the truth about today's youth
  • Testimonies from young people who have seen victory
  • Scripture and Biblical study
  • Tips and strategies on how you can get involved now

Use the informational and eye-opening discussion guides and DVDs for 6 weekly, small group sessions. It's perfect for a Bible study series, parent group, youth leader training, or Sunday School teaching!

We have little time to lose... the future of the Church in America hangs in the balance. Join BattleCry today!

name: Double Vision Curriculum
description:
To win this current generation, we must expand our vision.  We need a double vision so that we can do what we have never done before!

That's why Ron Luce has written Double Vision.  When you follow his guide to high-impact youth ministry, your youth group will double, triple, and may even grow ten times its size!  Ron shows you how to work smarter, not harder.  The Double Vision book series includes 3 books (Volumes 1, 2 &3) and a CD to help you customize your battle plan.  Dream, build, and lead using the strategies that have been tried and proven by today's successful youth pastors.

name: Collision Course Student Workbook
description: Additional Collision Course Student Workbooks used with the Collision Course Curriculum, which comes with one 10 pack of workbooks.

name: The Big Turnover
description:
Student-Led Youth Ministry (TM) is a time-tested and proven concept that can work in any church no matter the size or denomination. As students are trained, they become disciples who have a fresh and consistent walk with God for a lifetime and in the future become better spouses, parents and citizens of their community.

Hasn't youth group been a spectator sport long enough? This new revolution in youth ministry is an exciting approach that supplies the local church with something tangible to reach this generation.

    As you and your youth leaders train and equip your youth in Student-Led Youth Ministry, your teenagers will:
  • See their youth group grow in numbers
  • "Own" their ministry
  • Train others
  • Find their callings and use their gifts
  • Find their place and attend youth group more often
  • Become ambassadors for Christ
  • Be less likely to leave the church after high school
  • Develop confidence in God's ability to use them
  • Invest in the success of their ministry events
  • Influence their generation
  • Assume leadership positions within your church

    The Results of Student-Led Youth Ministry are mind-blowing! And here are some of the most incredible benefits:
  • You don't have to be a full-time youth pastor
  • There's no need for an extravagant youth facility
  • You don't need a big budget
  • It's not neccessary to have a cutting-edge worship band.

All you need is Passion!

Learn how to disciple and train teenagers to discover their callings, share their faith and operate their own ministry.

name: Story of God
description:
How God, having created the world and having watched it turn against His purpose, lived among us, was still rejected because he didn't fit expectations, turned everything upside down to get things back on track, and now invites you to find your place in The Story of God.

Today's New International Version New Testament

name: Rescue Manual For Parents
description:
What do I do if my teenager says "I don't know" every time I try to start a conversation?

What do I do if my teenager uses drugs?

What do I do if my teenager is sexually active?

What do I do if my teenager thinks the Bible or church is boring?

Help Has Arrived!

Raising teenagers today is not the same as it used to be in generations past. Growing up as a teenager today presents more obstacles to overcome than existed just twenty years ago. Our society has changed dramatically. Pressures have changed, temptations have changed, peer pressure has changed, and it has all affected the home.

After years of speaking to hundreds of thousands of teenagers around the country, Ron Luce discovered a significant need for today's parent - a survival guide for the most difficult years of parenting. He spent countless hours listening to teens share about their families, struggles, and challenges. He talked to thousands of parents who had dealt with those challenges to discover how they had successfully gotten through them. This fantastic rescue manual is a "how-to" guide, helping you as a parent get through the toughest issues your teens face.


This RESCUE MANUAL includes:

  • An easy flip tab reference system to help you find the answers you need fast!
  • Comments from young people themselves about how they wish their parents would handle difficult or awkward situations and issues.
  • Statistics and comments from experts in the field.
  • A biblical understanding of how to approach the issues that teens struggle with most.

name: ReCreate Study Guide
description:
DO YOU KNOW WHO OWNS YOUR KID'S HEART?
 
You see it every day in the sexualized brand marketing for everything from clothing to song lyrics, from TV and magazines to video games and websites.  Today's pop culture machine is insatiable for increasingly more market share, regardless of what (or who) it destroys.

It's fact that we are in a war for the hearts and minds of this young generation - and that includes your own children.  It will take all of us to win the war.  So buckle on some "body armor" and lob back a few missiles at the enemy.  You as a parent are in the prime position to make sure your child does not become just another casualty in this war of ideas.

In tandem with Ron Luce's book ReCreate and the corresponding small-group study DVD, this workbook will help you create a dynamic six-week study for small-group discussion.  You will be encouraged and equipped as you meet weekly with other parents to strategize how to protect your family in the midst of a raging cultural war.

Author:  Ron Luce

name: ReCreate DVD
description:
ReCreate -- Building a culture in your home stronger than the culture deceiving your kids.

DO YOU KNOW WHO OWNS YOUR KID'S HEART?

You see it every day in the sexualized brand of marketing for everything from clothing to song lyrics, from TV and magazines to video games and websites. Today's pop culture machine is insatiable for increasingly more market share, regardless of what (or who) it destroys.

It's a fact that we are in a war for the hearts and minds of this young generation -- and that includes your own children. It will take all of us to win the war. So buckle on some "body armor" and lob back a few missiles at the enemy. You as a parent are in the prime position to make sure your child does not become just another casualty in this war of ideas. Watch this DVD and work through the companion small-group study as you read Ron Luce's book ReCreate. You will be encouraged and equipped as you meet weekly with other parents to stratagize how to protect your family in the midst of a raging cultural war.

name: Mark of a World Changer
description: Do you have what it takes to become a WorldChanger? God is not looking for people who will blend in. He is looking for people who are ready to set the world on fire. If you want to develop qualities in your life that set you apart from the average, settle-for-the-status-quo person, The Mark of a WorldChanger shows you how you can become radically and totally changed by a vital relationship with God. This thirteen-week devotional guides you through ten challenges that build spiritual strength and Christian character into every aspect of your life. From committing to courtship and purity to starting a revolution in your hometown, The Mark of a WorldChanger offers specific steps to take every single day - steps that help you live life passionately and become a blazing radical who can rock the world while you're young. The Mark of a WorldChanger will help you say with thousands of others that the world can be changed because your life has been transformed by God.

name: Creating A Youth Ministry Movement
description: It's Time to Create a Movement! I am tired of average youth ministry - the ministry that has a social gathering of teens with good programs, a few leaders, and goes to camp. I want a ministry that creates a movement, a movement that spreads its influence beyond the walls of our church and moves into the hallways, classrooms, and locker rooms of our schools. I think we would all agree that creating a movement in our area sounds good, but how many of our youth ministries are actually doing it? This book is loaded with practical proven steps and not hypothetical theory. Get ready to create a movement right where you are! Author: Jacob Ouellette

name: Camphor's Quest
description:
"You are a very clever little man, Camphor," Melchior started.  He was speaking almost in a whisper, making sure no one else in the room heard his words.  "I checked yesterday after you two left the study room and found your secret."

Mohaad's hand went swiftly and silently to the dagger in his waist belt.

Melchior raised his hand to calm him and continued speaking softly, "No, my friend, Melchoir is not a threat to you.  The secret that I discoverd was the one of the language on both the document of the skin record and the document that King Caspar taught from.  It was impressive.  Tell me, how did you figure it out?"

Author:  K. C. Armstead
